body_html:
Forgive me if I'm missing on the point, I'm new to all this.
But I'm wondering what are you suggesting I do with taskset?
As I understand it taskset is used for binding or checking affinity of a process on CPU.
I don't quite see how it can help me here.

body:
Forgive me if I'm missing on the point, I'm new to all this.
But I'm wondering what are you suggesting I do with taskset? 
As I understand it taskset is used for binding or checking affinity of a process on CPU.
I don't quite see how it can help me here.
